## Description {#details}

Extract sentinel tracking option.

Look through <code>Options</code> for the <em><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ilist-sentinel-tracking">ilist&#95;sentinel&#95;tracking</a></em> option, with the default depending on LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;ABI&#95;BREAKING&#95;CHECKS.
